alert.note: Alert for Colbert (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 08 at 5:16PM CDT until June 08 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL COLBERT...NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN AND SOUTHWESTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 516 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Russellville, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Russellville, Littleville, Belgreen, Mt Hope, La Grange, Tharptown, Ne Smith, Rockwood, Landersville and Newburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
